mapper.select: SELECT C.REVIEW_NO, C.MEMBER_NO, C.RESER_NO, C.REVIEW_TITLE, C.REVIEW_CONTENT, C.REVIEW_CREATED, C.REVIEW_REV_NO FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY GALLERY_NO DESC) AS RNC, REVIEW_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESER_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_CREATED, REVIEW_REV_NO FROM REVIEW) C WHERE C.RNC BETWEEN #{beginRecord} AND #{endRecord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (REVIEW_NO, MEMBER_NO, RESER_NO, REVIEW_TITLE, REVIEW_CONTENT, REVIEW_CREATED, REVIEW_REV_NO) VALUES (REVIEW_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ${memberNo}, ${reserNo}, ${reviewTitle}, ${reviewContent}, SYSDATE, ${reviewRevNo})
INSERT INTO RE_IMAGE_SEQ (RE_IMAGE_NO, REVIEW_NO, RE_IMAGE_PATH, RE_IMAGE_SAVED, RE_IMAGE_ORIGIN) VALUES (RE_IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, ${reImageNo}, ${reImagePath}, ${reImageSaved}, ${reImageOrigin})
